updates.details: Issue receiving urgent attention from system team. LOTUS jobs currently unavailable (new jobs held in queues). Many hosts unresponsive due to mounting affecting storage system.
Identified cause and working to resolve as quick as possible.
Intervention and repair planned between Mon 26 Feb - Wed 28 Feb during which time tape services will be unvailable.
Investigative work ongoing, attaching new data transfer node. Some interruptions may result so transfers may be slower than normal.
